ABOUT ME

me

Hello there,

I'm Ney Thu ðŸ‘‹

Hello there, I'm Ney Thu ðŸ‘‹

I'm Ney Thu Aung, a passionate landscape photographer dedicated to capturing the beauty of our world through my lens.

Ever since I held my first camera, I've been entranced by the endless possibilities it offers to freeze moments in time, to tell stories without words, and to share the awe-inspiring vistas that surround us. Each click of the shutter is an opportunity to immortalize the fleeting beauty of nature, to preserve it for future generations to admire.

On this website, you'll find a curated collection of my favorite photographs, each one a labor of love crafted with meticulous attention to detail. From sweeping panoramas to intimate close-ups, every image is a testament to my deep reverence for the natural world and a celebration of its boundless diversity.

Thank you for joining me on this visual journey. I hope my photographs inspire you to explore, to appreciate, and to cherish the breathtaking landscapes that surround us.

NEY THU AUNG
